website_summaries.verdict: Touted as a versatile trail running shoe from Asics, the Gel Scram 5 sports a multi-surface grip ability, enabling you to conquer a multitude of terrains. It is packed with some of the brand’s state-of-the-art, reliable technologies to supplement unrivaled support. To combat odor production within the foot chamber, the Asics Gel Scram 5 is engineered using highly breathable materials that help wick away moisture.
pros: Several stated that the Asics Gel Scram 5 is very comfortable to wear
Many appreciate the lightness of the platform
It has a secure fit, commented a few runners
According to some, the shoe is very durable
A number of users note that it is versatile
the shoe has grippy traction on varied surfaces
cons: It lacks arch support, remarked some reviewers
The underfoot of the shoe feels a little stiff, expressed quite a few

customer_reviews.title: Run right away
customer_reviews.text: The first day I took these out of the box I ran four miles in them. They were like an already worn in pair of shoes. There was no rubbing, no stiffness. I love these. One thing worth noting, I can't comment on the comfort of the insole. I put my own inserts in the shoes. They are really light weight. They are good looking shoes. The black does get really dusty on the trail, but the material resists absorbing it pretty well; a lot of the dust can be clapped off. I am VERY happy with these. I almost can't believe I got such a good shoe for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Sanich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes for the price I paid. I wouldn't recommend putting inserts in these shoes. They tend to rub the sides of the shoes until they are worn. Maybe a size up might help with this issue. Other than that for 50 bucks these Asics are great running shoes. I use them at work because i stand all day and walk constantly around the shop. They are without a doubt my favorite brand of shoes for people with flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Grover

customer_reviews.title: didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: PROS The shoes are some of the most comfortable sneakers ive ever worn. I like the way they look and can breathe quite nice cons well they didn't last much more then about 3 months of everyday use and the gym. I actually bought 2 other pairs because I love the comfort level and was hoping that switching between the three that they all may last longer we will see
customer_reviews.author: josh landry

customer_reviews.title: One of the better ASICS for under a million bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, neutral sole so my foot doesn’t roll, adequate width so not constructing but I’m also not sliding. Just enough cushion to be comfortable running on pavement for 4+ miles. Semi-water resistant but will soak through in heavy rain without submerging in standing water. Good for all day long west or running.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Zero arch support. But look nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a long term review. I liked the style, but there is zero arch support and the insole felt weird around my heal. So I returned them after trying them on. I am 6'1" 165 lbs. I like the free returns from seller Z....s.
customer_reviews.author: brian reviews1

customer_reviews.title: Not really a trail shoe just for street walking.
customer_reviews.text: Not much arch support and a pretty flat shoe. I had to put an arch support in it. The lacing hits me too high. Not really a good jogging or trail shoe just a street walking shoe. It says a trail shoe but it wouldn’t stand up to much trail exposure and gravel easily gets in the shoe. A bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: These are 🔥
customer_reviews.text: Adequately made. Lightweight and breathable. Color(s) are remarkable, gel sole is comfortable while supportive. ASICS is a thing of joy when worn casually or workout activities.
customer_reviews.author: J I JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking. We do 4 miles each morning and these are holding up great after 2 months. I have plantar facaeitis and I do not need my arch supports when I wear these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair identical to these but slipped and ripped them so I bought this pair. My last pair stretched out and got very comfortable but this pair isn’t stretching and hurts my feet. I should have bought the wide ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for four months and the seams have come undone they have holes in the material the back heal insole is worn out and they do not breathe at all. They are not good for everyday use. I walk about 3 miles a day at work on cement floors and they are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: Usually love Asics, but subpar material used
customer_reviews.text: I've had two pairs of these. They are comfortable, but I've found both pairs had the same issue. On the inside back of the heal area toward the top they wear through the cheap material very quickly. The material used in this area is just not durable and is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Camshaft2011

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: I like Asics they are only shoes that are still comfy. These are nice looking and comfy at same time. Im not sure about material but will see.
customer_reviews.author: vedo

customer_reviews.title: nothing like the scram 4s
customer_reviews.text: totally diff animal. This is memory foam not a good running shoe. Returned immediately. Asics is the best idk what they were doing with this sketchers style crap.
customer_reviews.author: steve hart

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and sizes run half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest built ASICS shoes I’ve ever had. I always wear an 11 1/2 in ASICS. These definitely are not 11 1/2. They are to big. And I already wore them. So I lost my money I guess.
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this shoes for 4 months only for walking, not even for running. I mean that these shoes were just lightly used for 4 months. You can see the result in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: GEV

customer_reviews.title: Since 1976
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Tigers/Asics shoes since 1976. They are the only shoe that I can order online and know that they fit perfectly when they arrive. They last 5 years for me.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love looooove these shoes. Super comfortable. Great all day shoes. I have high arches and these are so comfortable. Asics has won me over.
customer_reviews.author: Ckerr1717

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare, so I needed new shoes to dedicate for my service. These shoes are easy on the feet and super light-weight, so I find myself moving fast and not thinking too much about foot pain. Design is fine and were the fit I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Imtiaz

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: Oddly shaped heel support that gave me insane blisters, quickly wore through the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Prime User 6

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are so comfortable and they fit perfectly. I wear a size 15 so it's hard for me to find shoes and these great.
customer_reviews.author: DEANDRE RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: The are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are more than light, I ran quicker and I could handle curbs more easily but most importantly when ever I stepped off the edge of the track the support from the sides of the shoe prevented me from rolling my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan  Morton

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, looks nice and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for casual wear and fitness. I haven't used it for running but there isnt much structure and support so I probably wont.
customer_reviews.author: jason Lever

customer_reviews.title: Holes in inner liner within a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Owned for few months, mostly worn walking and inside around the heel on both shoes is falling apart.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within a Week
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size is perfect and is very comfortable. But they Ripped at the bottom of the asic logo On the outside part of the shoe within a week of wearing them. I’ve had them for about 3 weeks now and both sides have ripped. I feel like a lot of people have had this problem with ASIC shoes in general because of their logo design. It ends right at the ball of the foot where the shoe bends
customer_reviews.author: Anna Wilmesher

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my favorite pair I have for running around and walking dog.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: Size was small and tight compared to my other ASICS shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: they fit like they were made for my foot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes comfortable and fit like they were designed for my foot!! highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable. Can be used for a hike as well, but not extreme rough terrain.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, fit, color, this shoe was better then expected all around!
customer_reviews.author: Djc33

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and very well made. Have had for 2 months and they're holding up well

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very supportive

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have ran two 5k's in these shoes and they are great. They are very comfortable and would highly recommend. The sizing was a perfect fit. I did not have to go up or down in size. I will buy these again we hen I need my next pair.

customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother because he’s an avid runner and he loves these! He has wide feet and is very tall so finding good support is rare... but he loves these for daily use!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable

customer_reviews.title: The perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! So comfortable! Very pleased with style and color and of course fit!
customer_reviews.author: dbm8802

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these to run outside. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: BRIDGETT BOLLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Hold true to the ASICS name
customer_reviews.text: Love ASICS. I wear these for work at the hospital and walk a minimum of 5 miles a shift. they are perfect. I bought the white and gray ones for work and I bought the black and red ones for the gym. great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: mango bango

customer_reviews.title: Asics are the best shoe, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, style, ect. Alwyas happy with Asics.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: comfy and perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and looks great. However, definitely order half a size or one size bigger. Overall quality is good enough for everyday use, gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. A comfortable running/walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Obi Tuan Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to leave reviews, but this sneaker is great. I am a contractor who is on his feet all day in work boots. When i get home and put these ASICS on, I feel like i am walking on air. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: johnny570

customer_reviews.title: Just a decent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Not much comfort. A little hard on the feel in you’re standing up all day.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gizinski

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable! Fits perfectly! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S McT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have not held up at all. Up until this past week these shoes had not been worn much. Spent a week hiking in the smoky mountains. The heels on both shoes are already torn. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Pavlik

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: They are a pretty good shoe. Haven’t had them long so it’s difficult to put in a good review. They few times I’ve worn them, I can not complain especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Where are these things made?
customer_reviews.text: This pair seem big? Like almost a 10 but labeled a 9 1/2. Also, they feel heavier then other ASICS I’ve ordered in the past. Not impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers! I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I recommended! I buying previously model. Best ! Winter, summer, autumn, spring... nothing happened to the sneakers! remained almost as new) I recommend to everyone to buy
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Moskalenko

customer_reviews.title: Yeah they are worth it
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Asics, I will for sure buy more Ascis. Lots of color options, perfect fit, worthy price point
customer_reviews.author: Zack H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and cushioned comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable and cushioned shoe perfect for walking on sidewalks and trails. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my nephew for football conditioning. He needed shoes that could go from running to weight lifting. He said they are comfortable and easily go from outdoor conditioning to the weight room.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend and he says they’re light weight, comfortable and he ordered his normal size and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. For walking and running they are super. For working out or any lateral movement I believe they are lacking that type of support but I know they are made as a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Great every day shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use custom inserts but over all great lightweight all around shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bishel

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and  a Great Trail Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Has nice break as you role over onto the ball of your foot. Good traction on rock and dirt.

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: Im big fan of ASICS shoes for the the GYM daily use they are the best
customer_reviews.author: hussain j h abul

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, best shoe ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very comfortable. I always wear size 12 shoes and this one fits the same. Would definitely buy again after i wear them out

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy ASICS. I regret it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible support for running. Worst laces that constantly become untied.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Felt a little tight around the mid-foot (even untied) but not an issue. Like the shoes very much in the first few days.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Toe box
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is not as roomy as other Asic shoes, I've owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable. Given the price, it’s a big win! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the shoes for 3 months and they are already falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable reliable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I personally like these shoes more than Nike or any other brand because of the comfort and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mckenney

customer_reviews.title: A treat for the feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Super comfortable right out the box and easy on the feet. Just was I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAficiondo

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. As comfortable as shoes that cost twice as much. Prompt delivery. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support
customer_reviews.text: Perfect support. I got a second pair because I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Helm

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support.
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean look. Very comfortable on trails and street runs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good support. Feet roll out the side really easy. I normally don’t have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tried these on at a local store and found them at a better price on Amazon. Love the orange and grey color combo, fit is true and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diabolicalgirl

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Scram 5 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The versatile men's GEL-SCRAM 5 performance trail running shoe by ASICS boasts multi-surface grip technology to help you take on tough outdoor terrains. A full-length AMPLIFOAM midsole provides enhanced cushioning for a protective ride, no matter how far you go. Extra support comes from the no-sew midfoot panel, which locks the foot down on the platform for lasting performance. Meanwhile our GEL technology in the rearfoot ensures an excellent level of comfort as you move. The GEL-SCRAM 5 shoe features a mesh upper for added ventilation and a removable ORTHOLITE sockliner for effective moisture management. Added balance is provided by the internal heel counter, which holds your foot in position, so you can stay 100% focused on going the distance. From its resilient outsole to its comfy underfoot feel, this simple yet effective performance running shoe is an essential part of any trail runner's gear.
feature_bullets: The rugged durability and flexible construction of the ASICS® GEL-Scram® 5 trail-running shoe will have you ready for adventure on every outdoor path!

Surface: Trail. Differential: Not specified. Synthetic leather and mesh upper for long-lasting comfort and breathability. Lace-up closure for a preferred fit. Padded tongue and collar. Reinforced toe cap protects against abrasions and trail debris. Breathable fabric lining. Removable OrthoLite® sockliner for underfoot support and comfort. Rearfoot GEL® Cushioning System attenuates impacting shock and allows for smother transitions. AmpliFoam™ midsole is engineered to maint
